Sentencas: To explore the dynamic characteristics of the SOFC systems and to develop relevant control strategies, a previously developed steady state SOFC model is converted to a dynamic model.
Titulo: Response of a planar solid oxide fuel cell to step load and inlet flow temperature changes

Sentencas: The model includes mass, momentum, thermal and electrochemical analysis, as well as the kinetic model of hydrocarbon reactions.
Titulo: Response of a planar solid oxide fuel cell to step load and inlet flow temperature changes

Sentencas: Applying two control strategies i.e., cell constant fuel flow rate and constant fuel utilization during the transient time, the model is implemented to analyse the dynamic behaviour of a planar direct internal reforming (DIR) SOFC cell under several step-load changes.
Titulo: Response of a planar solid oxide fuel cell to step load and inlet flow temperature changes

Sentencas: Transient response, resulting from an inlet temperature variation, is also investigated.
Titulo: Response of a planar solid oxide fuel cell to step load and inlet flow temperature changes

Sentencas: The results show that the relaxation time is strongly related to the thermal behaviour of the cell and the applied control strategy.
Titulo: Response of a planar solid oxide fuel cell to step load and inlet flow temperature changes

Sentencas: However, it is almost independent of the load variation magnitude.
Titulo: Response of a planar solid oxide fuel cell to step load and inlet flow temperature changes
